problem_text_cn: 如图所示，∠AOC=Mul(2,MeasureOfAngle(ABC))°，∠COD=Sub(147,Mul(2,MeasureOfAngle(ABC)))°，∠ODC=90°，Sub(MeasureOfAngle(BCA)=MeasureOfAngle(ABC))，O是圆O的圆心。求∠AOD的大小。
problem_text_en: As shown in the diagram, ∠AOC=Mul(2,MeasureOfAngle(ABC))°, ∠COD=Sub(147,Mul(2,MeasureOfAngle(ABC)))°, ∠ODC=90°, Sub(MeasureOfAngle(BCA)=MeasureOfAngle(ABC)), O is the center of ⊙O. Find the measure of ∠AOD.
